body: i like to dick wrestle. and by that i mean cock wrestle. and by that i mean cock fights. and by that i mean roosters pecking each other to death. Some more about me: I am a 44 year old trucker from Louisiana. My girlfriend is addicted to crack, my leg got shot off in the army, so now i need a brick to push down the pedals for me because i cant afford the hospital bills for a prosthetic leg. I cannot even afford a home. I live in the bags of weed that I smuggle across the Mexican border. My favourite artist is Bob Marley. I also recycle. One love.
